'''No Need For Bloodshed''' is a [[Badges|badge]] that can be obtained by playing the mission [[Toya's Perfection (Ch. 1)]] on the island of [[Angler's Grave]].

Objective: <big style="color:yellow">Don't attack or kill anyone.</big>
